forum.content:
Ninepins Island – Cruise to Hexagon Rocks, the Birthplace of Superman”

Date: 13th May 2018
Time: 09:45-18:00
Meeting Place: Meet at 9:45am
**The boat will dock at the Causeway Bay Public Pier and we will walk from meeting point together.**

Fee: HKD400 per person including food and drinks

Payment Deadline: 7th May (Monday) *Please pay on-time. If we don’t receive your payment before the deadline, we will replace you with someone from the waiting list.

Detail: After boarding onto the boat, we will set sail to NinePin Island and stay at there for the whole day, get back to CWB ferry Pier at about 6pm. Party food, Drinks and small amount of alcohol will be provided, but please also bring food and drinks to share.
We will be walking on the island, and you are advised to bring water shoes to protect your feet, water proof bag and swimming wear. We can snorkel too, so bring your gear.

有興趣可以message我 =）
forum.title: 5月13日有沒人有興趣遊船河？
